mapper.update:
update TM_DMP_RULE
ST_ID =#{stId,jdbcType=INTEGER },
RS_ID =#{rsId,jdbcType=INTEGER },
RULE_NAME =#{ruleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR },
RULE_ENABLED =#{ruleEnabled,jdbcType=VARCHAR },
RULE_TYPE =#{ruleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR },
PRIORITY =#{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER },
REMARK =#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR },
RULE_OBJECT =#{ruleObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR },
UPDATE_DATE =#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP },
UPDATE_BY =#{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR },
JPA_VERSION =#{jpaVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER },
where RULE_ID = #{ruleId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select from TM_DMP_RULE where RULE_ID = #{ruleId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
